评论概述: Not the same material as stated in the description or on the clothing tag
评论详情: I wanted to love this tank top. The fit is roomy for me because I don't care for skin hugging / snug tops. It fits great, BUT I'm not happy about the material. It clearly states that it's polyester spandex. Ok, cool. I'll order a top and see how the style is. Unfortunately, the description fails to mention that there is rayon in it as well, which gives it a different feel than just poly / spandex as stated.. its almost as though a feel of a cotton top  I was hoping that information was accurate, but it isn't, so I won't be buying more tops of this brand. Very disappointed
I recommend ordering a size smaller.

The product pictures are super misleading. Makes it look like it would accent an hourglass shape, which I have. But it is absolutely shapeless which is incredibly disappointing and makes me look HUGE around the waist and small on top which is not my shape at all. Bought three, will be sending them all back. I bought the same brand a couple of years ago and it looked like the pictures shown but not anymore. Really disappointed I was excited to buy these again.

I purchased this exact tank several years ago. Even though it was a little pricey for my taste I still loved it. The fit was very flattering and the fabric felt expensive. Last week, I purchased a few more ... one for each day of the week. What I received was knock off versions of the first shirt (a recurring theme with most Amazon purchases in the past year or so). The fit is ok, I like long tanks and shirts, plus it hides all the things I don't want people to see. But the fabric is incredibly cheap and smells like DOG PEE. I washed one but the dog pee smell is still there. Now I'm worried about the chemicals on that fabric being absorbed by my skin. Not clue. I'm returning them all. So so so disappointed. Amazon venders do better.

Agree with the majority - it ran very long.  And it ran big.  I read every review and then read the size chart.  Screw the size chart.  I am 148 lbs, 33 waist, 43 hips and a 36C and I am NOT a medium.  At 5'4" and all torso, the small may work.  Debating on going back for the small.  It was a decent quality, but not over the top, but for $25, it was meh.  Update.  I returned for a small which worked perfectly.  I imagine if you are any larger in the chest (greater than 36C) it will run tight.  But glad I exchanged for the small.  Still a funky top.  Feels like it the 90s again.
